entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 9.

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
